sentences.sContent: The government has promised to stop dumping by the state-owned chemical plants.
sentences.sCn: 政府已保证停止国营化工厂的倾倒行为。

sentences.sContent: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried toward the market.
sentences.sCn: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德旅馆，急匆匆地向市场赶去。

phrases.pCn: 垃圾堆积场；卸泥区；倾弃场
n. 垃圾堆积场；倾卸场
倾销幅度；倾销差价，倾销差额
n. 卸泥区；堆填区；倾卸区；倾倒物料区

words.tran: [车辆] 自动倾卸车；倾卸者；清洁工人

trans.tranOther: the act of getting rid of dangerous waste material in a place that is not safe
If you dump something somewhere, you put it or unload it there quickly and carelessly
